snippet.title: Official Trailer Skylanders Imaginators Reveal Gameplay(UK) l Skylanders Imaginators l Skylanders
snippet.description:
Who could you imagine in #SkylandersImaginators? Unleash your creativity!
Official Trailer Skylanders Imaginators Reveal Gameplay(UK) l Skylanders Imaginators l Skylanders 


Unleash your imagination and bring the Skylanders to life!
Kaos has discovered the ancient power of Mind Magic and is using it to create an unstoppable army of Doomlanders!

Eon is calling upon all Portal Masters and Skylands’ greatest mystic warriors, the Senseis, to stop Kaos and his minions. Now, you must use the power of your imagination to create your own Skylanders to battle in the ultimate adventure alongside the almighty Senseis to save Skylands. 


SUBSCRIBE: https://www.youtube.com/user/skylandersgame?sub_confirmation=1
  
Connect with Skylanders
Website: https://www.skylanders.com/video-games/skylanders-imaginators
Instagram: https://www.instagram.com/skylandersthegame/
Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/SkylandersGame/
Twitter: https://twitter.com/skylandersgame

About Skylanders Imaginators:
Kaos has discovered the ancient power of Mind Magic and is using it to create an unstoppable army of Doomlanders! Eon is calling upon all Portal Masters and Skylands' greatest mystic warriors, the Senseis to stop Kaos and his minions. Now, you must use the power of your imagination to create your own Skylanders to battle in the ultimate adventure alongside the almighty Senseis to save Skylands.

Official Trailer Skylanders Imaginators Reveal Gameplay(UK) l Skylanders Imaginators l Skylanders 
https://www.youtube.com/user/SkylandersGame
